name: Before Arriving at the Terminal
description:
DESCRIPTION

Before Arriving at the Terminal is a horror visual novel, which consists of short stories set in a suburban city.

STORY

I remember my past days around the city:


When I was an elementary school boy, I visited an abandoned hospital for a dare with my friend;
When I was a junior high school student, I looked for a mysterious shrine along a rail line with the friend;
When I was a high school student, I checked rumors about "ghosts of children" in the school with the friend;
And when I was an undergraduate, I met you.

Everything is in the memory of this city.

SideStory

You can play Before Arriving at the Terminal and its SideStory.
SideStory also consists of short episodes, which complement the main stories.

MUSIC

All tracks in the game are provided by Prhyzmica, a Japanese musician.
